_header: For Balliol bred in his book
Bibliographic Ghosts: Lincoln, Cathedral Library: deleted by Supplement; London, College of Arms, Arundel 14: not found in this copy of Peter Langtoft’s Chronicle (ff. 133-147); London, Lambeth Palace Library 131: not in this MS.
_description: English abuse of John Balliol inserted in Peter Langtoft’s Chronicle — two six-line stanzas (preceded by a French stanza)

for boule bredde in his hokewenne he tint þat he
                    toke…
OxfAllS39.Last Lines: …His tipetis es tippedHis tabard es tome

First stanza only, in Peter Langtoft’s
                    Chronicle.

Peter Langtoft’s Chronicle. Six-line French stanza followed
